In this session, we will be discussing from the 10th verse of the 9th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam.
This chapter describes the passing away of Bhishma Deva in the presence of Lord Krishna.
Bhishma is going to offer wonderful prayers to Krishna.
But before that, the description is given of the situation of Bhishma's passing away.
Krishna Chaitat Prabhavagya Asinam Jagadishwaram
Hridistham Pujayamasa Mayayo Patavigraham
The meaning of this verse is as follows.
Lord Sri Krishna is situated in everyone's heart.
Yet, he manifests his transcendental form by his internal potency.
This very Lord was sitting before Bhishma Deva.
And since Bhishma Deva knew of his glories, he worshipped him duly.
If you remember, in an earlier verse, it was described when the Pandavas were coming to the battlefield
